string.value: For this last experiment, Jane promises to make you a mysterious scroll. For that, she needs #ba moon rock, 20 dragon skins, and 10 saps of ancient tree#k. Maybe you should ask the fairies at Ellinia for the moon rock.

You got the materials Jane needed and the scroll for glove for ATT was made without a hitch. Sweet! Jane expressed a strong desire to keep experimenting. Maybe next time you return you'll be able to buy something from her that's not sold in stores...
Okay, this time, I'm even more ambitious! Want to help me with my third ever alchemy experiment?
Perfect! Get me 1 #b#t4011007##k, 20 #b#t4000030#s#k, 10 #b#t2012002#s#k. This time, I'm hoping to make a scroll.
Well, now. If you don't have time to listen to a poor girl's plea... Fine, just let me know if you change your mind.
Ah! You got me #b1 #t4011007##k, #b20 #t4000030#s#k, and #b10 #t20120021#s#k. Whew, I need a minute to mentally prepare myself...
While I do this, make sure you have an empty slot in your Use inventory. Okay, okay, breathe, breathe. Steady hands, and mix, and pour, and...
Oh my. Oh my goodness. OH MY! I am sooooo talented! Look! I made a #r#t2040804##k! I think I'm going to faint from happiness. I couldn't have done it with you, so here, take it. It's yours.
You haven't collected #b1 #t4011007##k, #b20 #t4000030#s#k, and #b10 #t2012002#s#k yet. You can get them all from monsters. Keep trying!
